mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOSMO_RBOARD( RKBNUM, KBNUM, RKBNAME, RKBCONTENT, MDELETEYN, MINSERTDATE ) VALUES ( #{rkbnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kbnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rkbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rkbcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.RKBNUM RKBNUM ,A.KBNUM KBNUM ,A.RKBNAME RKBNAME ,A.RKBCONTENT RKBCONTENT ,A.MINSERTDATE MINSERTDATE FROM KOSMO_RBOARD A WHERE MDELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.KBNUM = #{kbnum} ORDER BY 1 DESC
